Movies.name: Inside Out
Movies.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

Movies.name: Shrek
Movies.description: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

Movies.name: The Lion King
Movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Movies.name: The Boy and the Heron
Movies.description: In the wake of his mother's death and his father's remarriage, a headstrong boy named Mahito ventures into a dreamlike world shared by both the living and the dead.

Movies.name: Despicable Me
Movies.description: Gru, a criminal mastermind, adopts three orphans as pawns to carry out the biggest heist in history. His life takes an unexpected turn when the little girls see the evildoer as their potential father.

Movies.name: The Road to El Dorado
Movies.description: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

Movies.name: Lilo & Stitch
Movies.description: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

Movies.name: Ice Age
Movies.description: Manny the mammoth, Sid the loquacious sloth, and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger go on a comical quest to return a human baby back to his father, across a world on the brink of an ice age.

Movies.name: Turning Red
Movies.description: A thirteen-year-old girl named Mei Lee is torn between staying her mother's dutiful daughter and the changes of adolescence. And as if the challenges were not enough, whenever she gets overly excited she transforms into a giant red panda.

Movies.name: Robots
Movies.description: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

Movies.name: Hercules
Movies.description: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

Movies.name: Elemental
Movies.description: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, earth- and air-residents live together.

Movies.name: Howl's Moving Castle
Movies.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

Movies.name: WALL·E
Movies.description: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

Movies.name: Coraline
Movies.description: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, an 11-year-old Coraline discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life. In order to stay in the fantasy, she must make a frighteningly real sacrifice.

Series.name: SpongeBob SquarePants
Series.description: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast food restaurant, attends a boating school, and lives in an underwater pineapple.

Series.name: Hazbin Hotel
Series.description: In an attempt to find a non-violent alternative for reducing Hell's overpopulation, the daughter of Lucifer opens a rehabilitation hotel that offers a group of misfit demons a chance at redemption.

Series.name: Gravity Falls
Series.description: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

Series.name: Regular Show
Series.description: The surreal misadventures of two best friends - a blue jay and a raccoon - as they seek to liven up their mundane jobs as groundskeepers at the local park.

Series.name: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
Series.description: Marinette and Adrien, two normal teens, transform into the superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir when a mysterious evil threatens to destroy Paris.

Series.name: The Amazing World of Gumball
Series.description: The life of a twelve-year-old boy who happens to be a blue cat as he lives with his family and other strange creatures.

Series.name: Ben 10
Series.description: The story of Ben Tennyson, a typical kid who becomes very atypical after he discovers the Omnitrix, a mysterious alien device with the power to transform the wearer into ten different alien species.

Series.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
Series.description: In a war-torn world of elemental powers, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

Series.name: Arcane
Series.description: Set in Utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League of Legends champions and the power that will tear them apart.

Series.name: Blue Eye Samurai
Series.description: Driven by a dream of revenge against those who made her an outcast in Edo-period Japan, a young warrior cuts a bloody path toward her destiny.

Series.name: BoJack Horseman
Series.description: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show Horsin' Around in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.
